A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wow. I'm surprised. There is a huge reviewer/audience tomato gap. The movie that pro  reviewers praised to the sky has garnered only mediocre reactions. So of course the 56% score is based on the reviews of die-hard Starwars fans since they were the first to stampede into the theaters. Maybe later and less critical viewers might like it more. Disney had better hope...
